data.lyric:
[ti:A Holly Jolly Christmas]
[ar:Burl Ives]
[al:Talkative Friend]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]A Holly Jolly Christmas - Burl Ives (伯尔·艾夫斯)
[00:03.11]Written by：Johnny Marks
[00:06.23]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[00:08.59]It's the best time of the year
[00:10.49]
[00:11.39]I don't know if there'll be snow
[00:13.72]
[00:14.25]But have a cup of cheer
[00:15.59]
[00:16.18]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[00:18.70]And when you walk down the street
[00:20.65]
[00:21.48]Say hello to friends you know
[00:24.04]And everyone you meet
[00:25.55]
[00:26.60]Oh ho the mistletoe
[00:29.19]Hung where you can see
[00:30.79]
[00:31.82]Somebody waits for you
[00:34.39]Kiss her once for me
[00:36.12]
[00:36.71]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[00:39.25]And in case you didn't hear
[00:41.38]
[00:42.18]Oh by golly have a holly jolly Christmas
[00:45.79]This year
[00:46.67]
[00:56.50]Holly jolly holly jolly ho
[01:01.31]Have a holly jolly Christmas
[01:03.95]And in case you didn't hear
[01:06.10]
[01:06.85]Oh by golly have a holly jolly Christmas
[01:11.40]This year
